excerpt: "If you’re looking to the future of the automotive industry, you can do worse than to listen to the wise counsel of the Volkswagen Group CEO. According to Herbert Diess, it’s not electric vehicles, but autonomous cars which marked a watershed moment and will prove to be the \"real game-changer\" for the industry."
